headline: Ask HN: How smart is your cat?
description:
Inspired by this comment : https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30554638

Our cat could 'count', in that she knew how many people were at the dining table, she knew how many desert plates to expect. Only when she had them all, she would leave.

We had another cat who couldn't : she sometimes would leave early or stayed while there were not desert plates left.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你的猫有多聪明？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你的貓有多聰明？
description_zh-Hans:
受此评论启发：https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30554638

我们的猫会 "数数"，因为它知道餐桌上有多少人，它知道有多少个餐盘。

我们的另一只猫就不行了：她有时会提前离开，或者在没有甜点盘的时候留下来。
description_zh-Hant:
受此評論啟發：https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30554638

我們的貓會 "數數"，因為它知道餐桌上有多少人，它知道有多少個餐盤。

我們的另一隻貓就不行了：她有時會提前離開，或者在沒有甜點盤的時候留下來。
